prompt_template:
Work on the following task for spec '{spec_name}':

## Task {task_id}: {task_title}

{task_description}

IMPORTANT:
- When you complete the work, you MUST run 'git add' followed by 'git commit' with a clear message
- DO NOT just stage files - you must actually commit them
- DO NOT ask permission - start working immediately
- Make atomic commits for each semantic group of changes
- You may use claude-flow MCP if helpful for coordination
